articles.author: Rudransh Khurana
articles.title: "Laut aao Kohli the captain" - Fans on Twitter troll Rohit Sharma, miss Virat Kohli after horror show on WTC Final Day 1 - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Rohit Sharma and India have come under fire from fans on Twitter for conceding 327 runs and taking just three wickets on Day 1 of the World Test Championship (WTC) Final against Australia at The Oval.
articles.content: Rohit Sharma and India have come under fire from fans on Twitter for conceding 327 runs and taking just three wickets on Day 1 of the World Test Championship (WTC) Final against Australia at The Oval… [+1746 chars]

articles.author: Shaunak Ghosh
articles.title: Ajinkya Rahane Becomes 8th Indian To Achieve Elusive Feat, Joins Sachin Tendulkar, Virat Kohli In Elite List - Times Now
articles.description: In the first innings, Ajinkya Rahane took the catch to dismiss Australian skipper Pat Cummins off a Mohammed Siraj delivery. This was Rahane's 100th catch as an outfielder in Test Matches. He now becomes the 8th player from the country to reach the three-figu…
articles.content: Ajinkya Rahane Becomes 8th Indian To Achieve Elusive Feat, Joins Sachin Tendulkar, Virat Kohli In Elite List
